item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (1049 points | 321 comments)
2. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (237 points | 67 comments)
3. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (99 points | 62 comments)
4. FLUX is fast and it's open source (60 points | 23 comments)
5. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (87 points | 6 comments)
6. Omni SenseVoice: High-Speed Speech Recognition with Words Timestamps (16 points | 3 comments)
7. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (410 points | 379 comments)
8. Can logic programming be liberated from predicates and backtracking? [pdf] (28 points | discuss)
9. Washington's 'forgotten giant' volcano stirs (30 points | 11 comments)
10. The 1/8th Sleep (67 points | 6 comments)
11. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (45 points | 7 comments)
12. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (679 points | 142 comments)
13. Gödel Agent: A self-referential agent framework for recursive self-improvement (34 points | 5 comments)
14. DuckStation (129 points | 48 comments)
15. The Explore vs. Exploit Dilemma (19 points | 2 comments)
16. Starship Flight 5 license issued by FAA (206 points | 175 comments)
17. Heart rate variability differs between smartwatch and clinical testing (5 points | 1 comment)
18. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (63 points | 30 comments)
19. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (451 points | 300 comments)
20. A mountain? Multistorey car park? Both? Inside Shanghai's £225M summit (28 points | 5 comments)
21. Home Libraries Will Save Civilization (21 points | 9 comments)
22. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (127 points | 23 comments)
23. PayPal (USA) will automatically share data about you to participating stores (234 points | 86 comments)
24. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (351 points | 50 comments)
25. IcePanel (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers in Vancouver ( | hide)
26. Ask HN: If you were rewriting Emacs from scratch, what would you do differently? (72 points | 146 comments)
27. First Greenhouse Gas Plumes Detected with NASA-Designed Instrument (94 points | 31 comments)
28. Who are AMD, Intel's new manycore monster CPUs for? (25 points | 17 comments)
29. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (25 points | 12 comments)
30. Machine learning and information theory concepts towards an AI Mathematician (93 points | 16 comments)
